WorkItem.Description: Logging out from any page other than Default.aspx causes a page not found error. I have tested this on Events, News and Membership pages only, but suspect it is the same if you logout from any page that is in a sub-folder.

Comments.Message:
I should have added that this error only occurs from a Hosted site, I don't get an error when running from the Development Server. 

If others are not seeing this problem, I suspect it might be related to my earlier Beta 2 Navigation Problem post [url:http://www.codeplex.com/ClubStarterKit/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=8837] and be specific to that Host (Lunarpages.com).

The Navigation from a sub-folder problem went away when I upgraded to RC1 and I haven't come across any other sub-folder related problems with RC1 except for this one.

Ed
I am having the same problem, I am using RC1
Try it on something without a querystring. The problem is the query string.
